title.rendered: STEDI 40MM TO 45MM TUBE CLAMP BULL BAR MOUNTING BRACKETS | BLACK

content.rendered:
These black bullbar bracket can be used for effortless mounting of our range of HID Spot Light and Light Bars

OVERVIEW

The STEDI Tube Clamp Bull Bar Brackets offer a stable mounting platform for bullbars that are not fitted with tabs for UHF Antennas and LED lights. Made from cast aluminium with stainless steel fasteners keeping it strong yet light weight as well as a polyester UV stable powder coat to reduce fade.

VERSATILE

With the ability to mount light bars on the top or alternatively flipped upside down hanging from the tube, the tube clamps give you as much adjustability as you need to angle your lights from any position. Also a popular choice for mounting UHF Antennas.

WORK LIGHTS

Our Tube Clamps also have the ability to mount the majority of our LED Work lights. Compatible with LED Work Lights from as small as the 10w Mini up to as large as 60w Mining Spec.

DETAILS

Black Bull Bar brackets to suit 40 to 45mm tube diameter made from High Quality Aluminium. These bulbar brackets can be used for effortless mounting of our range of HID Spot Light and Light Bars. Can also be used to mount the following;

  • Communications Antennas
  • Reversing Camera Systems
  • Driving Lights
  • LED Light Bars

To measure whether these brackets are suitable for your application, please measure the circumference of your round bar and apply below formula; diameter = circumference / 3.14

Please ensure you carefully measure your bull bar to ensure correct fitment. You can pick up any slack with rubber inserts, which recommend to prevent scratches on your applied surface.

Price is for 2 brackets. We also have other colours and sizes.

Rubber inserts also included.

We stock all popular sizes including 48-53mm  60-65mm and 76-81mm in both black and silver, please check our store listings.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

MATERIAL Aluminium
WIDTH 40 to 45mm

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x 40 to 45mm Aluminium Bull Bar Bracket
  • 2 x Rubber Inserts
  • 4 x Stainless M6 Bolts
  • 4 x Stainless Nuts
  • 4 x Flat Washers
  • 4 x Lock washers
  • Instruction Manual

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
